data.title: 485 Firestone Way, Lompoc, CA 93436
data.meta_description: 485 Firestone Way, Lompoc, CA 93436 is a 3 beds, 3 baths, 2424 SqFt Single Family Residence home. View property details, photos, school and neighborhood data, and more.
data.text: Congratulations on finding your dream home in Country Club Estates! NO HOA !This one-of-a-kind property offers a spacious layout with 3 bedrooms, 2.5 baths,3 car garage and 2,424 square feet of living space. Situated on over half an acre in a cul-de-sac, you'll enjoy breathtaking views of the Burton Mesa preserve. The kitchen is a highlight of the home, featuring tile countertops, stainless steel appliances, wood cabinets, and wood flooring. The living room and family room both boast vaulted ceilings, creating a sense of grandeur and openness. The double-sided fireplace adds warmth and charm to both spaces. Additionally, new carpet has been installed throughout the home. The hallway bathroom is bright and airy, thanks to skylights that bring in natural light. The spacious master suite is a true retreat, with vaulted ceilings, ample natural light, and a walk-in closet. The master bathroom is a dream come true, offering a walk-through shower with custom tile, a double vanity, a Jacuzzi tub, and access to the backyard. Speaking of the backyard, it is large and open, adorned with mature Oak trees and featuring a deck off the kitchen. It's the perfect space for outdoor entertaining and relaxation. In addition to the 3-car garage, there is extra room for RV parking. The front yard also offers convenience with a drive-through driveway for easy access and exit. Country Club Estates is located just minutes away from the golf course,. which includes a restaurant, pool, and tennis courts. And the best part? and id I say no HOA! This home truly has it all, so don't miss out on this incredible opportunity. Hurry and make it yours!
